actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to allow claims for credit or refund for transportation expenses incurred with respect to employment at the antiballistic missile site near Nekoma, North Dakota.

summary.text: Allows claims for credit or refund of income tax due to deductions for transportation expenses incurred during 1970 through 1974 with respect to employment at the antiballistic missile site near Nekoma, North Dakota.

titles.title: A bill to allow claims for credit or refund for transportation expenses incurred with respect to employment at the antiballistic missile site near Nekoma, North Dakota.
